name: Pixel War Combat: Zombie Survi
description:
Pixel War Combat: Zombie Survival is one of the best zombie games in the category. If you are prepared to survivor and beat hordes and more hordes of undead zombies then this action-adventure game is for you. Infection with a deadly virus has turned the world into a dead zone and now you have to survive in pandemic at all costs and find a way to stop the zombie apocalypse. And try not to die, otherwise humanity will be doomed. The plague must be stopped, every dead man must be in the grave. Get headshots, do missions in this wonderful first-person 3d game (FPS 3d) open world.
Features:
- Modern weapons (Sniper, Rifle, Pistol)
- System of Hordes of Zombies
- System to survive and survive
- 3d Zombie Game
- Voxel cube graphs
- Pandemia
- Open world
